function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"International collaboration involving 25 academics creates potential for transmission of contagious diseases across borders.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases globally due to international travel and interaction.","Mitigation":"Implement strict screening and quarantine measures for academics traveling between countries.","Technologies":"Health screening technology, contact tracing apps, and quarantine management systems.","People":"Academics, travelers, and individuals in contact with international collaborators.","Owner":"Health authorities, academic institutions, and international organizations."},{"Description":"Podcasting project involves close contact between academics, increasing the risk of transmitting contagious diseases within the academic community.","Impact":"Potential outbreak of contagious diseases among academics participating in the project.","Mitigation":"Promote adherence to health and safety guidelines, encourage remote collaboration, and implement regular testing and monitoring.","Technologies":"Video conferencing platforms, remote collaboration tools, and health monitoring devices.","People":"Academics, project coordinators, and support staff involved in the podcasting project.","Owner":"Project coordinators, academic institutions, and health authorities."}]}
